SEO_DESCRIPTION: I'm Luis Velasco, a software engineer specialized in web development. This is my portfolio, where you can find information about my experience, projects, and blog.

SEO.PROYECTOS_DESCRIPTION: On this page, you'll find a list of projects I've worked on throughout my career. Some of them are personal projects, while others are client-based.
SEO.BLOG_DESCRIPTION: This is the blog of Luis Velasco, a software engineer specializing in web development. Here, you'll find articles on technology, software development, and best practices.

SOBRE_MI_DESC: Software Engineer with 3+ years of full‑stack experience, focused on modern architectures, FinTech solutions, and AI‑driven apps. Expert in Next.js, NestJS, React, Laravel, and Python, with hands‑on experience implementing LLMs using tools like LangChain for process automation and optimization. Passionate about innovation, system scalability, and building products with real impact.
TECH_FAVORITAS_DESC: Throughout my career, I’ve worked with various technologies. I have a passion for exploring new libraries, frameworks, and programming languages. Here’s a list.
EXPERIENCIA_DESC: My professional experience has focused on web application development, both frontend and backend. Here's a summary of my experience.

EXPERIENCIAS.AFIF_EXPERIENCIA_DESC: Designed and optimized a scalable electronic invoicing platform with ERP capabilities for Ecuadorian SMEs.|• Improved performance by >30% through code refactoring and SQL query optimization|• Reduced deployment times by >40% implementing CI/CD pipelines with Docker automation|• Integrated Meta API for bulk WhatsApp invoice delivery and automated marketing campaigns|• Built an appointment scheduling system with real-time concurrency and conflict handling|• Led architecture improvements ensuring scalability, maintainability, and best practices|Tech Stack: Next.js, NestJS, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Docker, Meta API, rule.js
EXPERIENCIAS.GENESIS_EXPERIENCIA_DESC: Developed an intelligent proforma analysis solution using AI to automate price comparisons.|• Implemented image processing with OCR and analysis using LLMs (OpenAI GPT-4)|• Designed automated workflows with LangChain for efficient document processing|• Created scalable RESTful APIs with FastAPI optimized for high concurrency|• Reduced manual proforma analysis time from hours to minutes with >95% accuracy|Tech Stack: Python, FastAPI, LangChain, OpenAI API, OCR, PostgreSQL
EXPERIENCIAS.MANACLOUD_EXPERIENCIA_DESC: Contributed to developing a SaaS meal reservation platform for companies improving organizational control.|• Implemented complete CRUD modules for managing periods, meals, and schedules in admin panel|• Developed main user interface for reservation system with optimized UX|• Integrated real-time validations and complex state management with React Hooks|• Collaborated in agile sprints with cross-functional teams using Scrum methodologies|Tech Stack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, React Query, Axios

EXPERIENCIAS_MPOWERTRADE.MPOWERTRADE_EXPERIENCIA_DESC: Led development of a corporate landing page focused on conversion and digital positioning.|• Conducted requirements gathering and functional design with stakeholders|• Optimized images with modern formats (WebP, AVIF) improving load speed by 60%|• Implemented on-page SEO strategies increasing search engine visibility|• Designed strategic CTAs applying user psychology principles to maximize conversion|• Configured Google Analytics and key metrics for tracking and continuous optimization|Tech Stack: Astro, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, SEO, Google Analytics

PROYECTOS_DESC: Here, you'll find a list of projects I’ve worked on throughout my career. Some of them are personal projects, while others are client-based.

PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_UTRACE_DESC: Mobile app for emotional wellness tracking with React Native. Features daily mood logging, activity monitoring, and visual progress reports with Firebase sync.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_MICRO_SHOP_DESC: Microservices architecture demo with NestJS simulating an e-commerce platform. Showcases distributed systems with independent services for users, products, and orders.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_POKEDEX_DESC: RESTful API with full CRUD operations for Pokémon management. Built with NestJS, MongoDB, and Docker for scalable data handling.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_ANT_DESC: AI-powered web scraper automating traffic citation analysis from Ecuador's ANT. Uses Playwright for data extraction and Gemini AI for intelligent processing with email/Telegram notifications.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_OUTIFY_DESC: 3rd place at Hack the Future. AI-driven trip planner with personalized itineraries, budget automation, and real-time coordination via Google Calendar, WhatsApp & Telegram. MVP in 7 hours.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_IAN_DESC: 2nd place at HackIAthon. RAG multi-agent system optimizing construction bidding with LangChain & OCR. Features document analysis, RUC validation via scraping, and risk scoring dashboard.
PROYECTOS_PERSONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_AIMAGE_DESC: Prompt library for generating trending images with AI. Prompts are organized by categories and artistic styles for easy use, in addition to the prompts there is an option to generate images directly from the platform using the Gemini API.

PROYECTOS_PROFESIONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_ROSVEP_DESC: Modern corporate landing page for brand-boosting services. Features responsive design with Astro, optimized SEO, and conversion-focused CTAs.
PROYECTOS_PROFESIONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_GENESIS_DESC: Full-stack intelligent proforma analyzer powered by OpenAI. Automatically compares prices from uploaded images, highlights best deals, and generates comparative tables using LangChain & FastAPI.
PROYECTOS_PROFESIONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_PUCEM_DESC: Healthcare management system for PUCEM University covering medicine, physiotherapy, and nursing. Built with Next.js for efficient patient monitoring in Portoviejo.
PROYECTOS_PROFESIONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_MPOWERTRADE_DESC: Landing page for Mpowertrade built with Astro. Delivers strategic consulting, content creation, and digital transformation services with optimized UX and conversion tracking.
PROYECTOS_PROFESIONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_PLANIFIA_DESC: Comprehensive appointment management system with multi-channel notifications (WhatsApp, SMS, email). Features intelligent scheduling with calendar views, automatic reminders, appointment confirmations, client administration with complete history, and real-time alerts for business owners.
PROYECTOS_PROFESIONALES_LISTA.PROYECTO_BILLEASE_DESC: Electronic invoicing platform for SMEs in Ecuador. Enables issuing, managing, and storing electronic invoices compliant with SRI regulations. Developed with Laravel, PHP, and PostgreSQL for a robust and scalable solution.
